Detailed Description

Allocator wrapper tracking allocations.

Pool where all pointee objects are allocated and tracks memory blocks for later enlisting & marking the block_header the pointee object belongs to.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef std::list< numeric::interval<long>, fast_pool_allocator< numeric::interval<long> > > boost::detail::bp::pool::pool_lii

static block_base* boost::detail::bp::pool::top ( void *  p  )  [inline, static]

Tracks the memory boundaries where a pointer belongs to. Also gets rid of the boundaries that were allocated before the pointer was allocated.

Parameters:
p Pointer that is being tracked.
Returns:
Pointer to the pointee object where p belongs to.
